items.text: length outside off, left alone
items.postText: Shoaib : "Saifuddin has complicated matters by batting Well. Logically he's the one that should make way for Rubel. And Shakib's injury is like losing 2 players for BD. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: slashed over the infield. Length and wide outside off. Gets his hands from underneath this and slices it in the end. Once again, not the greatest connection, but it's safe once he gets it over the fielders
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: short of a length on the pads, deflected to short fine's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length ball wide outside off, left alone
items.postText: BowlingGreggy : "Bangladesh must be sick of the sight of Guptill. Remember when he was out of form? (It was last week)"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, glanced to deep square
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, guided to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: beaten on the outside edge. Length ball pushed across him, fishes at it loosely
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: length outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg's left
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, short of a length on leg stump. Dropped into the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, opens the face and slices to third man's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, skips up and slashes at this. Sweeper is a few yards in and is running backwards to his right. It's a hurried dive and he only manages to drag it onto his own body, which pushes the ball into the boundary to his right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked through square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run

items.text: length ball wide outside off, throws his hands at this and slices uppishly to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: another fifty for Guptill in the series. Short ball outside off, not at a worrying pace at all. Stands tall and pulls to deep square's left. He does a good job of sprinting to his left and throwing himself at this, but it's a repeat of the earlier boundary - the momentum of his body deflects the ball into the boundary padding
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to mid-on's right
items.postText: Aayan: "Ohhhh gosh! Come on BD Let's make a match of it."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short ball rising up at an off stump line. Sways away from it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: short ball at leg stump, drops it behind square on the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length at off stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: length outside off, driven to sweeper's right
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short and rising outside off, gets on top of the bounce and defends to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: full outswinger very wide outside off, left alone
items.postText: Arik Shams: "Waking up at 4am in the morning, sleeping only 2hrs and watching this disappointed performance from Bangladesh team is really frustrating. The way they are playing seems like they will have to learn cricket from the beginning. No spirit is shown on the field."
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 wide

items.text: length outside off, sliced to point on the up
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run
